dungeon.model.structure
Class Door

java.lang.Object
  dungeon.model.structure.Tile
      dungeon.model.structure.Door
All Implemented Interfaces:
Persistent
public class Door
extends Tile
implements Persistent

A door tile
Doors can be open, closed or locked
Note: By default, locked doors are opened by any key; this can be overridden
